ygData.subject: Re: [New Guild Chapters, and a Rainbow Festival]
ygData.msgSnippet: David Lari  wrote: Hello all, For those of you who have volunteered to be the guild leader for Mystical Alliance on the other servers
ygData.messageBody:
David Lari <kerik@...> wrote:

Hello all,

For those of you who have volunteered to be the guild leader for Mystical
Alliance on the other servers (other than Brell Serilis) I need some
information from you. On many of the servers, I do not have a character yet,
so the easiest thing is for me to create a new character in a starting city
this is convenient to where you are located. So, send me the following
information:

Name of guild leader character: Sharada
Nearest starting city: Felwithe/GFay

If we need to be online at the same time, David, let me know and we can set it
up.

<snip>

Also, re: the Rainbow Festival, most anytime on Saturday the 28th will work
for me. My preference is probably a.m. to early afternoon, but will make a
point on being there in Freeport at the appointed place and time. Not sure
which character will be there yet, but most likely Ananda, Cleric of Brell.
Looking forward to getting together with you all! Haven't been on Brell for a
couple of weeks because I've been playing my Erollisi chars. <grin> The newbie
and lower level areas are not nearly as crowded now...

See you all on Saturday!

Christine
